column4: hey, ive misplaced my mouse (actually cant find it ;~)) is there anyway i can use some sort of keyboard combo or something to controll the mouse?
some combination of ctrl/shift/alt/meta/windows/bucky and the numpad keys might get you there.
using GNOME (Ubuntu)? Press <Menu> and navigate to System > Preferences > Assistive Technology, tab to Keyboard Preferences, Return, Tab, Right, Down, Space to toggle, Alt+C to close
